title: Please 15 Orange Esence :)))
body: I am 15 orange essence from my archduke nasus skin and ill really apreciate that :)

replies.body: You're so close!  We aren't able to offer essences but others have mentioned, just playing games will be your best bet.  Hang in there, and good luck!  :D
earning keys is so easy nowadays lol just wait till the next month to earn 4 more chests and open em.

To get more Orange Essence, disenchant another skin or ward skin token. Don't have any spare tokens? Earn more chests and keys while playing and hope you open another skin, or even get Essence from the chest. The alternative would be to buy some chests to open.
